short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension for importing ESPN fanstay NFL league into TopProp

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The TopProp ESPN Chrome Extension is a bridge that enables users to connect their ESPN Fantasy Football account to the TopProp webapp. With  this extension users can import their ESPN Fantasy Football Leagues into TopProp and enable automatic updates.
